{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = ZIO 3300N.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Wireless Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = ZIO_3300N |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = ZIO |model = 3300 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = N |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8196C; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = Lexra |cpu1_type_rev = RLX4181 |cpu1spd = 390 |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L1606EM2I-12G; |flash1size = 2 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 16 |ram1chip = EtronTech;EM639165TS-6G; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:2E:00 |oui = 00:2E:00
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = rtkload;v1.1f;; |stockos = Linux;2.6.30.9;Realtek SDK v2.5-r7984;
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = 192.168.10.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = zio |defaultssid_regex = ^zio$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 04/08/2011 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8192CE; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "ZIO-3300N (2011. Bless Inc.)", "ST-NR5TA", and "2011/04/08 VER:1.3" is silkscreened on the board.
==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== {{/Serial info}}
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery caption="internal" mode="slideshow"> Image:ZIO_ZIO-3300N_board_top.JPG|board top Image:ZIO_ZIO-3300N_RTL8196C.JPG|RTL8196C Image:ZIO_ZIO-3300N_RSU_Flash.JPG|Flash Image:ZIO_ZIO-3300N_RAM.JPG|RAM Image:ZIO_ZIO-3300N_RAM_USD_Flash.JPG|RAM and Flash (upside down) Image:ZIO_ZIO-3300N_RF.JPG|RF Image:ZIO_ZIO-3300N_RTL8192CE_big_w_RF.JPG|RTL8192CE w/ RF Image:ZIO_ZIO-3300N_RTL8192CE.JPG|RTL8192CE Image:ZIO_ZIO-3300N_board_top_angledtop_side_view.JPG|board top, angled above, left side Image:ZIO_ZIO-3300N_board_top_angledtop_middle_rside_view.JPG|board top, angled above, right side Image:ZIO_ZIO-3300N_cap_logo.JPG|capacitor logo Image:ZIO_ZIO-3300N_Bless_SS.JPG|Bless silkscreened text Image:ZIO_ZIO-3300N_other_SS.JPG|addl. silkscreened text Image:ZIO_ZIO-3300N_board_bot.JPG|board bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]] <gallery caption="external"> Image:ZIO_ZIO-3300N_angled.JPG|angled Image:ZIO_ZIO-3300N_model_label_side.JPG|model label side Image:ZIO_ZIO-3300N_model_label_closeup.JPG|model label closeup Image:ZIO_ZIO-3300N_side_ant_view.JPG|side, antenna view Image:ZIO_ZIO-3300N_top_ant_cross.JPG|top, antenna cross Image:ZIO_ZIO-3300N_WPS_button_side.JPG|WPS button side Image:ZIO_ZIO-3300N_port_side.JPG|port side Image:ZIO_ZIO-3300N_bottom.JPG|bottom Image:ZIO_ZIO-3300N_label.JPG|label </gallery></center>[[Has images::label| ]][[Has images::external| ]]
